channel.title: Bengaluru on Tejaswi's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Bengaluru on Tejaswi's blog

item.title: Streetlights per ward in Bengaluru
item.description: Streetlights per ward in Bengaluru # Uncomment to install geopandas if not already installed # !pip install geopandas import geopandas as gpd import pandas as pd # Load data lights = pd.read_csv("C:\\Users\\ADMIN\\Downloads\\streetlights-in-bengaluru-wards.csv") world = gpd.read_file("BBMP.geojson") # Plot the world GeoDataFrame world.plot() # Convert 'KGISWardName' columns to string world['KGISWardName'] = world['KGISWardName'].astype(str) lights['KGISWardName'] = lights['KGISWardName'].astype(str) lights['Street lights'] = lights['Street lights'].astype(int) # Merge the DataFrames on 'KGISWardName' result = pd.merge(world, lights, on='KGISWardName', how='inner') result.
